mapper.sql: id, housename, size, address, create_date, remarks, del_flag
a.id AS "id", a.housename AS "housename", a.size AS "size", a.address AS "address", DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') AS "createDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert:
insert into account_warehouse
id,
housename,
size,
address,
create_date,
remarks,
del_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{housename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update account_warehouse
housename = #{housename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM account_warehouse a where a.del_flag = 0
and a.title LIKE concat('%',#{title},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(reate_date) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${startTime} 00:00:00')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(create_date) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${endTime} 23:59:59')
order by a.create_date desc
;

SELECT ifnull( count(DISTINCT a.id) , 0 ) FROM account_warehouse a where a.del_flag = 0
and a.title LIKE concat('%',#{title},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${startTime} 00:00:00')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.create_date) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP('${endTime} 23:59:59')
;
